metadata.name: AI
metadata.description: 6000x9000 RGB sRGB IEC61966-2.1, 300 dpi. 25.1 MB. The image was created using Wonder, Dall-E, Stability AI (DreamStudio), Photoshop, and Adobe Illustrator. The text was written by Open AIâ€™s Chat GPT, from the following prompts: 1) Write a 100 word fictional account of the birth of AI as if AI were a Greco-Roman god.  2) Write a 100 word fictional account of the corruption of AI leading to the extermination of humanity.
